import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ForgotPassword from './ForgotPassword'; import ResetPassword from './ResetPassword'; import EmailTest from './EmailTest'; const ForgotPasswordDemo = () => { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('demo'); const [demoToken] = useState('demo-token-123456789'); const renderDemo = () => (

üîê Forgot Password & Reset Password Demo

Comprehensive demonstration of forgot password functionality

üìß Forgot Password Form

User enters email to receive reset link

üîë Reset Password Form

User sets new password using token from email

üß™ Email Test Tool

Test email sending functionality

‚ú® Features Implemented

üîí Security

  • 32-byte hex token generation
  • 1-hour token expiration
  • One-time use tokens
  • Password strength validation

üìß Email Integration

  • Gmail SMTP configuration
  • HTML email templates
  • Professional email design
  • Real email delivery

üé® User Experience

  • Responsive design
  • Form validation
  • Loading states
  • Success confirmations

‚ö° Technical

  • React Router integration
  • RESTful API endpoints
  • Error handling
  • MongoDB integration

üîå API Endpoints

POST /api/auth/forgot-password Send reset password email
POST /api/auth/reset-password/:token Reset password with token
); return (

setCurrentView('demo')} />
)} {currentView === 'reset' && (
